names of stars such as Rihanna and Katy Perry are being thrown into the mix in an attempt to compete with TV giant, American Idol. A friend of Cheryl Cole 's boyfriend, Derek Hough revealed: Everyone thinks Cheryl Cole has the judging job on US X Factor in the bag. "The truth is, nothing has been signed and the producers still aren't convinced. "They are more keen to get a big US star like Katy Perry or Rihanna on the panel- someone who will bring credibility to the show and who is already popular in the US. " Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government," he said. Labour leader Ed Miliband said: He's now done the right thing but he should have done it earlier. I think it raises real questions about David Cameron 's judgment that he hung on to Andy Coulson for so long. Andy Coulson had a stellar rise from humble beginnings, working his way through the ranks of Australian-born tycoon Murdoch's British tabloid stables and becoming editor of the News of the World at just 34.

I think that might be the easiest game I ever played in my career. I was out there watching, Allen Iverson hollered across the locker room after Carmelo Anthony scored a career-high 49 points to lead the Denver Nuggets past the Washington Wizards 111-100 Friday night.
